thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Thorhallur Ragnarsson
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Thorhallur Ragnarsson

author: Thorhallur Ragnarsson
title: Thorhallur Ragnarsson
text: Banggood has quickly become my first option to search for gadgets. They offer fast expedited shipping at a very reasonable cost and reliable service. Until now I have only got items of good quality. Recently I received a faulty item, was immediately offered a choice of refund or new item which is on its way. Service and support appears to be quick and efficient.
